name: vernalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of making seeds or plants cold for a time so that they start growing : Seeds are not affected by vernalisation in the early germination stages. The plants were grown in the greenhouse for 3 weeks, followed by a 5-week vernalization period at 4°C.
More examplesFewer examplesLow temperature vernalization is the most important factor governing the transition from vegetative to reproductive development in this plant.The variety requires no vernalisation, meaning that flowers are produced 10 to 12 weeks after the seed is sown.
